title: 作业刚做完
author: xujiesen2003
txt_content:
时间：晚上10:17


有次最晚的我做到凌晨1点[bedrock][bedrock][bedrock][bedrock][bedrock]


                     （史蒂夫挖矿：有钻石！！！！！挖吧！！！[stone_pickaxe][diamond_ore]用石搞哇的，结果[blank]没了？？？？？！！！！！！然后[lava][lava][lava][lava][lava]有岩浆!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!最后屏幕左下角"Steve was ?? by lava"）

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: 叫你不早把作业做完，现在杯具了吧？
